rottapeli.peli

Class HighScore

  • java.lang.Object
    • rottapeli.peli.HighScore

  • public class HighScore
extends Object
    High score container. Object that reads an external highscore file and stores the data within it. When the game is over, new scores are added into the container and updated highscore data is overwritten to the external file.
    Author:
    Pavel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HighScore()
      Constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HighScore

        public HighScore()
        Constructor. Loads the high score data.

    • Method Detail

      • loadHighScore

        public void loadHighScore()
        Loads and stores the highscore data. Stored highscore will be in order from highest to lowest score.

      • retrieveScore

        public int retrieveScore(String string)
        Translates a line of string into the score data that contains a name and score value.
        Parameters:
        string - A line of string found from the external file.
        Returns:
        Score value.

      • saveHighScore

        public void saveHighScore()
        Saves the updated highscore data.

      • getNameByRank

        public String getNameByRank(int rank)
        Retrieves the name of the player that has a high score at a specified rank.
        Parameters:
        rank - Specified rank of the high score.
        Returns:
        The name of the player at a specified rank.

      • getScoreByRank

        public int getScoreByRank(int rank)
        Retrieves the score at a specified rank.
        Parameters:
        rank - Specified rank of the high score.
        Returns:
        The score value at a specified rank.

      • getRankByScore

        public int getRankByScore(int points)
        Retrieves a rank that given score value is entitled for.
        Parameters:
        points - Specified score value.
        Returns:
        A rank that given score value is entitled for.

      • insertScore

        public void insertScore(String name,
               int points,
               boolean saveChanges)
        Inserts a score into the high score while not breaking the order of the high score.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the player that achieved the score.
        points - Score value that is to be inserted.
        saveChanges - Set to true if changes should be saved to an external file.

      • isInTop

        public boolean isInTop(int topRanks,
              int points)
        Checks if the specified score value is among the best scores.
        Parameters:
        topRanks - Lowest rank to be considered. To check if points are among top ten scores, set topRanks = 10;
        points - Score value that is checked.
        Returns:
        true if score is among best scores.

      • clearHighScore

        public void clearHighScore()
        Empties highscore.
